xxxxx.var.score.csv   :  table for varBScore plot
1.CHROM	: chrome name
2.Start	: chrome name
3.End	:	window end position
4.varBScore	:  varBScore for each windows


xxxxx.var.score.ann.topX.csv : windows of varBScore with gene information with varBScore at top X
1.CHROM	: chrome name
2.Start	: window start position
3.End :	window end position
4.varBScore	:  varBScore for each windows
5.wild.AF : Alle frequency of wild bulk
6.mutant.AF : Alle frequency of mutant bulk
7.wild_parent.AF : Alle frequency of wild parent bulk (Optional)
8.mutant_parent.AF : Alle frequency of mutant parent bulk (Optional)
9.background.AF : Alle frequency of background bulk (Optional)
10.AFD(deltaSNP) : Alternative allele frequency difference (mutant.AF - wild.AF)
11.REF_FRQ : total ref allele coverage of two bulk / total coverage (both refer and allele) of two bulk
12.wild.DP : wild bulk read coverage depth
13.mutant.DP : mutant bulk read coverage depth 
14.wild_parent.DP : wild parent bulk read coverage depth (Optional)
15.mutant_parent.DP : mutant parent bulk read coverage depth (Optional)
16.background.DP : background bulk read coverage depth (Optional)
17.POS : Positon
18.REF : Reference genotype
19.ALT : Alter genotype
20.Feature : Variant impact type
21.Gene : Gene ID on this locus
22.Transcript : Transcript ID on this locus


varBScore method:
Dong, C., Zhang, L., Chen, Z., Xia, C., & Gu, Y. (2020). Combining a New Exome Capture Panel With an Effective varBScore Algorithm Accelerates BSA-Based Gene Cloning in Wheat. 11(August), 1â€“12. https://doi.org/10.3389/fpls.2020.01249
